sentences.english: Nobility and dignity of people is the core values of humanitarian.
sentences.chinese: 人的高貴和尊嚴是人道主義的核心價值。

sentences.english: Walls of imperial palaces and royal buildings were coated with white surfacer and decorated with red paint.
sentences.chinese: 宮城城牆以及高貴建築物牆體塗抹白灰朱粉爲裝飾。

sentences.english: In the darkness, he was graceful and lonely, standing on the top of the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 站在沙發的靠背頂端，高貴又孤單。

sentences.english: For all these noble reasons and more, sloppy people never get neat.
sentences.chinese: 因爲所有這些高貴之處，邋遢的人從來就沒有整潔過。

sentences.english: A plowman on his legs is higher than a gentleman on his knees.
sentences.chinese: 站着的農民比跪着的紳士高貴。

sentences.english: Hoping that they would wind up on top.
sentences.chinese: 寄希望於他們能出身高貴。

sentences.english: The decoration of the hotel is dignity and elegance.
sentences.chinese: 酒店裝修高貴典雅，有直達電梯到各樓層。

sentences.english: Noble and elegant, the medals are a blending of traditional Chinese culture and Olympism.
sentences.chinese: 高貴而典雅，獎牌是中國傳統文化和奧林匹克的融合。

sentences.english: She has a quiet dignity about her.
sentences.chinese: 她身上有一種嫺靜的高貴氣質。

sentences.english: Come into the living, you will find the true nobleness come from the people.
sentences.chinese: 走進生活才發現真正的高貴來自人民。

sentences.english: It has lost its noble and reserved character .
sentences.chinese: 它失去了高貴和矜持的特性。

sentences.english: In Chinese culture , white crane bears a symbol of elegance , nobleness as well as long life.
sentences.chinese: 在中國文化裏，白鶴是優雅，高貴，長壽的象徵。

sentences.english: Noble, elegant living, Lily in the head, Xinxin moved.
sentences.chinese: 高貴氣質，典雅生活，麗麗在目，鑫鑫動容。

sentences.english: The more subtle and less easily perceivable its fragrance, the more noble the flower may be regarded.
sentences.chinese: 香味越微妙，越不易辨別出來是什麼花，便越加高貴。

sentences.english: Whereas equality militates against distinction and authority, fraternity does not do this.
sentences.chinese: 儘管平等對高貴和權威產生不利影響，但博愛不會。

sentences.english: Red has been praised for its nobility as the colour of life.
sentences.chinese: 紅色因爲它的高貴而被讚譽爲生命的顏色。

definition: style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
